text: The Avenger, Zorro (, ) is a 1972 Spanish-Italian adventure film written and directed by Rafael Romero Marchent. == Plot == == Cast == * Fabio Testi as Don Diego / Zorro * Carlos Romero Marchent as Fred MacAslim * Frank Braña as Dominguez * Simone Blondell as Perla Dominguez * Piero Lulli as Bill Warner * Andrés Mejuto as Brook * Eduardo Calvo as Richter * Luis Induni as Sheriff * Riccardo Garrone ==Release== The Avenger, Zorro was released on 21 February 1972. ==Footnotes== ===Sources=== * ==External links== * Category:Italian adventure films Category:Italian films Category:Spanish adventure films Category:Zorro films Category:1970s Western (genre) adventure films Category:Films directed by Rafael Romero Marchent Category:Films scored by Lallo Gori Category:Films with screenplays by Rafael Romero Marchent Category:Spanish films
title: The Avenger, Zorro
